Minimal Gatsby MDX blog theme built with Theme UI.
Use this as a starting point for building custom blog themes with Theme UI.
Shadow the following components to customize styles and page layout:
Index page for all blog posts
Wrapping layout component for the Post and Posts components
to override or customize the theme.
This theme is based off of
and uses all the same options.
Root url for all blog posts
(if your website already is using the plugin pass
